name: Digital Toys
description:
This is my first visual novel, and made as a way of learning how to use Ren'py.

You play as the Digimon Lopmon, and you and Terriermon have to avoid getting caught by Suzie, who wants to play.

Characters: Lopmon, Terriermon, Henry, Suzie, their parents, Impmon.

6 different endings. Each play through takes a couple of minutes, so playing all of it takes about 12 minutes. I hope people can enjoy it!
